title: Watch: Chairlift Cover Beyoncé With Das Racist's Kool A.D.

excerpt.full: Since this gem of a cover dropped through Triple J radio over the weekend, I haven’t been able to drag my ears away from it. On paper it’s utterly perfect, with Chairlift’s Caroline guesting on Das Racist’s brilliant “Fashion Party” 2 years ago. In reality it managed to be even better. Caroline’s voice more than \[…\]
